interactivity.requirements: Thursday You must be on at least Day  217  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Happy Places "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first Thursday on or after Day 217.

progression.synopsis: It's karaoke night again, and while Ayane sings with a reluctant Ami , Sensei talks to Maya outside. Following his failure to get through to Makoto , Sensei now wants to ask Maya whether there's anything strange about the school rooftop. She says that she just goes there to reset the world out of habit, but does wonder if Makoto could have seen something up there. Maya says that Makoto may go back to normal at the upcoming reset. She also says that severe personality changes like Makoto's are not unprecedented, although they are rare for people other than Sensei.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.11.
